channel.title: ASF Jira

item.title: [HIVE-13870] Decimal vector is not resized correctly
item.summary: Decimal vector is not resized correctly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Simple patch. prasanth_j mmccline the same patch that we have discussed before
